name: crawler
description: A simple dungeon crawler written in typescript using phaser and parcel.
author: Sebastian Riga

scripts.develope:browser: yarn clean:tmp && concurrently "parcel src/index.html -d .tmp -p 3000" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && open-cli http://localhost:3000"
scripts.develope:electron: yarn clean:tmp && concurrently "parcel watch src/electron.ts src/index.html --public-url ./ -d .tmp --out-file=app --target=electron" "wait-on .tmp/app.js && electron .tmp/app.js"
scripts.build:browser: yarn clean:build && parcel build src/index_dist.html --public-url ./ -d build --out-file=index
scripts.build:electron: yarn clean:build && parcel build src/electron.ts src/index_dist.html --public-url ./ -d build --out-file=app --target=electron
scripts.dist:browser: yarn clean:dist && parcel build src/index_dist.html --public-url ./ -d dist --out-file=index
scripts.superclean: yarn clean:dist && yarn clean:build && yarn clean:cache && yarn clean:tmp && yarn clean:documentation
